titleStmt.title: Office of the Assistant Commissioner for the Bureau of Refugees, Freedmen, and Abandoned Lands

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Office of the Assistant Commissioner for the Bureau of Refugees, Freedmen, and Abandoned Lands

body.p: Office of the assistant commissioner for the Bureau of Refugees, Freedmen, and Abandoned Lands (Freedmen's Bureau), handling affairs relating to refugees, freedmen, and the custody of abandoned lands and property at the state level. Reported to the commissioner in Washington, D.C.

ab.bibl:
“African American Records: Freedmen’s Bureau,” The United States National Archives
and Records Administration https://www.archives.gov/research/african-
americans/freedmens-bureau (accessed January 29, 2020)
